ccpn.AnalysisMetabolomics.AnalysisMetabolomics module¶

class ccpn.AnalysisMetabolomics.AnalysisMetabolomics.Metabolomics(applicationName, applicationVersion, commandLineArguments)[source]¶

Bases: ccpn.AnalysisAssign.AnalysisAssign.Assign

Root class for Metabolomics application

setupMenus()[source]¶
showDecompositionModule()[source]¶

Opens the PCA module. if you need to get the PCA module or the Decomposition base class: get the specific instance from the current ccpnModules. This allows to have multiple PCA modules at the same time
